name: NoGoal
description: The NoGoalToken $INO is a SPL token that enables NoGoalFaces NFT holders to upgrade their faces' attributes. Buy new attributes for a INO price depending on rarity and attribute type, and get a INO credit of half the attribute price if you wish to remove it or replace it! The token was originally airdropped to 22,785 unique addresses across the world, mostly without any token holding requirements, making it one of the largest and most equitable Solana airdrops yet!
